title: Opposite gender skins
body:
annie = mannie

its a good idea
10/10

replies.body:
https://media.giphy.com/media/3XSWffoziHWtG/giphy.gif
Male Nami ;P

of course, we also need
http://i.imgur.com/o4aeo9Z.gif
Reverse Nami for her too.
It'd have to be expensive rp wise right? It's a full model change

It's definitely something unexplored by Riot. Skins are alternate fantasies of the character anyway.... I get the feeling the community would receive this very well. 
Much excellence indeed.

I'm still waiting for a Senna legendary Lucian skin.

It would be perfect.
